alert.note: Alert for Central and Southeast Phillips; Northern Phillips (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 8:37PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Phillips County through 930 PM MDT... At 835 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southeast of Turner, or 32 miles west of Whitewater, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Whitewater, Loring, Port Of Morgan and Chapman. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
